description: Explore how NFTs are revolutionizing the music industry by empowering musicians with new opportunities for monetization, creativity, and fan engagement. This comprehensive overview covers the benefits and challenges of utilizing blockchain technology in the music sector.
keywords: NFTs, music industry, blockchain, digital assets, monetization, musicians, fan engagement, royalty, smart contracts, Kings of Leon, Grimes, Steve Aoki
title: NFTs and the Music Industry: Empowering Musicians in the Digital Age
